short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search for any image while browsing on Alibaba!
short.zh_CN: 在Alibaba上快速搜索浏览时看到的任何图片！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly search Alibaba for any image you see while browsing!

Source products from Alibaba with ease! It will let you search for similar products on Alibaba with one click. 

When you hover on any image you see on the web, this extension's icon will appear in the image's top-left corner. Click on the icon to initiate searching for similar products on Alibaba Image Search. 

This saves you lots of time because you don't have to download the image to your computer and then go to Alibaba and upload that image in their search. You just press the button and the extension does it for you!
long.zh_CN:
浏览时看到的任何图片都可以一键快速在阿里巴巴上搜索相似产品！

轻松从阿里巴巴采购产品！ 它可以让您一键在阿里巴巴上搜索相似的产品。

当您将鼠标悬停在浏览器上看到的任何图像上时，图像的左上角将出现搜索图标，点击该图标即可开始在阿里巴巴上搜索类似产品。 

这可以为您节省大量时间，因为您不必将图像下载到计算机上，然后前往阿里巴巴上传该图像。 您只需按一下按钮，它就会为您完成！
